announcements.title: Phase Two of Provincial Re-Opening
announcements.descriptive:
As of Wednesday, June 30th, our maximum capacity will be 25%.
We apologize for any inconvenience.  Please see our schedule below.

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](http://peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGe…).

The televised Sunday Mass will continue on YouTube.
Check [Special events](#schedule2) below for information and links.

announcements.title: Join our mailing list
announcements.descriptive:
Be the first to know!
Stay in the loop with everything going on at The Cathedral.

Sign up to receive regular updates, announcements, links to bulletins, and more,
delivered straight to your inbox!

Let's stay connected.

[Sign up...](https://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/dont-miss-out)

announcements.title: Bishop's Statement
announcements.descriptive:
Let us continue to pray for the members of the Indigenous community and for all those impacted by this tragedy.

[Read Bishop Miehm's full statement](https://www.peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGeneral/Homepage-banners/Residential-School/KamloopsIndianResidentialSchool-June-2021.pdf)

regularEvents.title: Confession
regularEvents.descriptive: Maximum of 15% of capacity in the Cathedral at any time.
